pages.title: Veilweaver's Prism
pages.text: Suspended at the center of the Enigmatic Illusions Hall, the Veilweaver's Prism is a multifaceted crystal etched with intricate runes. It emits a gentle, iridescent glow and continuously manipulates light and perception to create immersive, three-dimensional illusions.

pages.title: Functions
pages.text: The Prism harnesses ambient magical energy to project elaborate illusions for training, deception, and scholarly study. It also serves as an interactive archive of ancient Hexcasting formulas and lore.
